title: Satisfactory progress in treatment program as mitigating factor
context: [ยง353G-12] Satisfactory progress in treatment program as mitigating factor. A person&rsquo;s satisfactory progress in a treatment program as determined by the treatment program&rsquo;s report shall be considered a mitigating factor and evidence of the person&rsquo;s amenability to treatment for purposes of determining the terms and conditions of parole or other release from a correctional center or facility. [L 1998, c 152, pt of ยง2]
